org.qbroker.net

Class CQLConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qbroker.net.CQLConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector

    public class CQLConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    CQLConnector connects to a Cassandra cluster and provides some basic CQL operation methods: select(), and execute().

    This is NOT MT-Safe. Therefore, you need to use multiple instances to achieve your MT-Safty goal.
    Author:
    yannanlu@yahoo.com

      • getResult

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getResult(int type,
                                               com.datastax.driver.core.ResultSet rset,
                                               int[] rc)
                                        throws com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.DriverException
        It gets all the rows from the ReseulSet and packs them into a StringBuffer according to the ResultType. The int array of rc should have at least two numbers. The first is for the number of rows. The second is for the number of columns.
        If any returned string is null, it will be reset into an empty string.
        Throws:
        com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.DriverException

      • getResult

        public static java.lang.StringBuffer getResult(java.util.List<com.datastax.driver.core.ColumnMetadata> list,
                                               int[] rc)
                                        throws com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.DriverException
        It gets all the rows from the list of ColumnMetadata and packs them into a StringBuffer according to the ResultType. The int array of rc should have at least two numbers. The first is for the number of rows. The second is for the number of columns.
        If any returned string is null, it will be reset into an empty string.
        Throws:
        com.datastax.driver.core.exceptions.DriverException
